description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5d5rc","text":"This is a cDNA library preparation protocol with the aim to quantify SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater and potentially detect its different variants using Next Generation Sequencing (Illumina). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu99f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brm2b","text":"In this protocol, we amplified cDNA from viral RNA extracted from wastewater. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kqi8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc4pk","text":"The main steps involve:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"246kf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcako","text":"Amplification of cDNA with ARTIC v3 primers","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37qst","text":"Ligation of amplified cDNA to NEB UDI UMI adaptors","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gin7","text":"PCR enrichment of the libraries","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad8v1","text":"Pooling libraries together for sequencing","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9grp4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1onem","text":"The further analysis pipeline used to perform assembly and intra-host/low-frequency variant calling is the nf-core/viralrecon:  https://nf-co.re/viralrecon","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":128,"length":27}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ejrg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7itfa","text":"This protocol is still under revision","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7773FFD1AAA511ECB6A10A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://nf-co.re/viralrecon"}}}}

keywords: SARS-CoV-2, Covid-19, wastewater, coronavirus, viral RNA, sewage

steps.section: Ligate amplified cDNA to NEB UDI UMI adaptors
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e10qi","text":"For choosing adaptors, follow the following manual: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7t8va","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpmps","text":"NEBNext® Multiplex Oligos for Illumina® - Unique Dual Index UMI Adaptors DNA Set 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":82}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59lu","text":"NEB #E7395S ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3qds","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2emlk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amv5u","text":"\"Designed for use in library prep for DNA, ChIP DNA and RNA (but not Small RNA), the NEBNext Unique Dual Index UMI (Unique Molecular Identifier) Adaptors enable high-efficiency adaptor ligation and high library yields. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":219}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jse","text":"These adaptors contain all necessary sequences for sequencing on the Illumina platform, and are compatible with PCR-free applications and sample pooling prior to PCR amplification\". steps.section: Checking library size distribution and library quantification
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a6ngf","text":"After clean up, run 0.5 µL of the cDNA (diluted 1:10  4.5 μL of water) on a Agilent TapeStation with HS D1000 Tapes to look at the size distribution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5ul2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg7tu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9en40","text":"We recommend running a few randomly selected libraries to confirm size distirbution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ran2","text":"If this the first time doing it and we see consistent aberrant patterns showing up, then it will be necessary to run all libraries to judge how widespread the issue is. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vid","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qo2l","text":"Below is an example of expected size distribution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j95g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24t9q","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3lut4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"81BB0760AC4D11ECA1041568C926BBB7","height":609,"id":249770,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hv7nbn7x7.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hv7kbn7x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hv7mbn7x7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hv7jbn7x7.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.section: 3. Ligate amplified cDNA to NEB UDI UMI adaptors
cDNA synthesis
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2b74a","text":"After cDNA clean up, you can run 1 µL of the cDNA, diluted 1:10 on Agilent TapeStation with HS D1000 Tapes to look at the size distribution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":67,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4v72a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj74j","text":"If you are confident the sizes would be correct, just use Qubit HS dsDNA protocol to quantify the input DNA amount. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":58,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81p0v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"81meq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ao4dt","text":"This cDNA quantification step is crucial for this protocol because it affects the experiment set up in subsequent procedures","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Ligate amplified cDNA to NEB UDI UMI adaptors
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"euha","text":"Adaptor dilution and ligation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p5c2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u0am","text":"In this step we use parts of both protocols  (E7395 and E7650) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj6lb","text":"- Adaptors with UMI are used","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b74sc","text":"- A smaller reaction volume is used following that of the ARTIC kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nfi6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"480g5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcqjm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ligate amplified cDNA to NEB UDI UMI adaptors
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bs7oj","text":"Adaptor dilution (optional depending on amount of input DNA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":60}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j41j","text":"In this step the cDNA quantification information is detrimental. Depending on the amount of DNA input, adaptor dilution is a necessary step. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pks","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akghb","text":"\"If DNA input is ≤ 100 ng, dilute NEBNext Adaptor\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ufkt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh9v0","text":"Please refer to NEBNext® Ultra™ II DNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina®","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmm1","text":"NEB #E7645S/L, #E7103S/L   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"be6nh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5trpe","text":"Step 2. \"Adaptor Ligation - Determine whether adaptor dilution is necessary\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftdbs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6270h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"B6829A4BA93711ECB5830A58A9FEAC02","id":219366,"original_name":"NEBNext Ultra II DNA library prep for Illumina E7103-E7645.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gyhgbn7x7.pdf"}}}}

steps.section: Ligate amplified cDNA to NEB UDI UMI adaptors
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e7lgq","text":"End Prep","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnhi6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eccea","text":"Follow the step 2.4 of NEBnext End Prep  protocol in the NEB kit for SARS-CoV-2 detection manual (E7650)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":17},{"style":"bold","offset":98,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ligate amplified cDNA to NEB UDI UMI adaptors
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8o641","text":"Adaptor ligation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46f3d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gd7h","text":"Use NEBNext® Ultra™ II DNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina® NEB #E7645S/L, #E7103S/L as a guide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":93}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtebj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du8ne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6d5t","text":"The E7650 protocol uses NEBNext adaptors for Illumina which are truncated and must be PCRed to add the full P5 and P7 sequences. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k5k4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lhjr","text":"Those NEBNext adaptors also need the USER enzyme because the adaptors need to be cleaved prior to the PCR step.
